benchmark_details.name: JudgerBenchV2
benchmark_details.overview: JudgerBenchV2 is a comprehensive benchmark evaluating cross-domain judgment accuracy and rank consistency to standardize judge model evaluation.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To improve the evaluation landscape for judge models and provide a more comprehensive and accurate benchmark.

data.source: Constructed from a variety of publicly available judge and reward datasets, clustered real-world user queries, and high-performing model responses.
data.annotation: Judgments based on a Mix-of-Judgers consensus and evaluated by a judge model.

methodology.calculation: Performance scores are derived by comparing judgments against ground truth from a Mix-of-Judgers.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better judgment accuracy and consistency in rankings.
methodology.baseline_results: CompassJudger-2 consistently outperforms other judge models, achieving state-of-the-art performance.
methodology.validation: Through rigorous evaluations against multiple judge benchmarks.
